## IDragStrategy.startDrag() method

Handles any drag startup (e.g moving elements to the front of the workspace).

**Signature:**

```typescript
startDrag(e?: PointerEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent | _(Optional)_ PointerEvent that started the drag; can be used to check modifier keys, etc. May be missing when dragging is triggered programatically rather than by user. |

**Returns:**

void
